00055 //
00056 void Op_Grad_P0_to_Face::associer(const Zone_dis& zone_dis,
00057                                   const Zone_Cl_dis& zone_Cl_dis,
00058                                   const Champ_Inc& )
00059 {
00060   const Zone_VDF& zvdf = ref_cast(Zone_VDF, zone_dis.valeur());
00061   const Zone_Cl_VDF& zclvdf = ref_cast(Zone_Cl_VDF, zone_Cl_dis.valeur());
00062   la_zone_vdf = zvdf;
00063   la_zcl_vdf = zclvdf;
00064 
00065   porosite_surf.ref(zvdf.porosite_face());
00066   volume_entrelaces.ref(zvdf.volumes_entrelaces());
00067   face_voisins.ref(zvdf.face_voisins());
00068   orientation.ref(zvdf.orientation());
00069   xp.ref(zvdf.xp());
00070 
00071 }
00072 
00073 DoubleTab& Op_Grad_P0_to_Face::ajouter(const DoubleTab& inco, DoubleTab& resu) const
00074 {
00075   assert_espace_virtuel_vect(inco);
00076 // Debog::verifier("Op_Grad_P0_to_Face::ajouter, inco 0 :",inco);
00077   const Zone_VDF& zvdf = la_zone_vdf.valeur();
00078   const Zone_Cl_VDF& zclvdf = la_zcl_vdf.valeur();
00079   const DoubleVect& face_surfaces = zvdf.face_surfaces();
00080 
00081 // double coef;
00082   double dist;
00083   int n0, n1, ori;
00084 
00085 // Boucle sur les bords pour traiter les conditions aux limites
00086 
00087 // int nb_elems = zvdf.nb_elem();
00088 // const DoubleTab& xv = zvdf.xv();
00089 
00090   int ndeb, nfin, num_face;
00091   for (int n_bord=0; n_bord<zvdf.nb_front_Cl(); n_bord++)
00092     {
00093 
00094       const Cond_lim& la_cl = zclvdf.les_conditions_limites(n_bord);
00095       const Front_VF& le_bord = ref_cast(Front_VF,la_cl.frontiere_dis());
00096       ndeb = le_bord.num_premiere_face();
00097       nfin = ndeb + le_bord.nb_faces();
00098 
00099 // Correction periodicite :
00100       if (sub_type(Periodique,la_cl.valeur()))
00101         {
00102           for (num_face=ndeb; num_face<nfin; num_face++)
00103             {
00104               n0 = face_voisins(num_face,0);
00105               n1 = face_voisins(num_face,1);
00106 // coef = volume_entrelaces(num_face)*porosite_surf(num_face);
00107               dist = volume_entrelaces(num_face)/face_surfaces(num_face);
00108               resu(num_face) += ((inco(n1) - inco(n0)))/dist;
00109             }
00110         }
00111       else
00112         {
00113           for (num_face=ndeb; num_face<nfin; num_face++)
00114             {
00115               n0 = face_voisins(num_face,0);
00116               if (n0<0) n0=face_voisins(num_face,1);
00117               ori = orientation(num_face);
00118               int face_opposee=zvdf.elem_faces(n0,ori);
00119               if (face_opposee==num_face) face_opposee=zvdf.elem_faces(n0,ori+dimension);
00120               n1 = face_voisins(face_opposee,0);
00121               if (n1==n0) n1=face_voisins(face_opposee,1);
00122               resu(num_face) += (inco(n1)-inco(n0))/(xp(n1,ori)- xp(n0,ori));
00123             }
00124         }
00125 // Fin de la boucle for
00126     }
00127 // Boucle sur les faces internes
00128 
00129   for (num_face=zvdf.premiere_face_int(); num_face<zvdf.nb_faces(); num_face++)
00130     {
00131       n0 = face_voisins(num_face,0);
00132       n1 = face_voisins(num_face,1);
00133       ori = orientation(num_face);
00134 
00135 // coef = volume_entrelaces(num_face)*porosite_surf(num_face);
00136       resu(num_face) += (inco(n1)-inco(n0))/(xp(n1,ori)- xp(n0,ori));
00137     }
00138 
00139   resu.echange_espace_virtuel();
00140   return resu;
00141 }
00142 
00143 DoubleTab& Op_Grad_P0_to_Face::calculer(const DoubleTab& inco, DoubleTab& resu) const
00144 {
00145   resu=0;
00146   return ajouter(inco,resu);
00147 }

00149 int Op_Grad_P0_to_Face::impr(Sortie& os) const
00150 {
00151   Cerr << "Op_Grad_P0_to_Face::impr is not coded !" << finl;
00152   exit();
00153   return 1;
